QuestData.Title: Audience with the Prophet
QuestData.Description: I need you to deliver the translated documents to Velen personally, $n. I don't trust that deranged messenger.$B$BExplain to the Prophet that the blood elves are receiving reinforcements from the Outland and that they have a spy amongst the draenei at the Exodar. Velen resides in the Vault of Lights inside the Exodar.$B$BMake haste!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Translated Sunhawk Missive to Prophet Velen at the Exodar.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Velen smiles.>$B$BGreetings, $n. I have been expecting you.
QuestData.RewardText: <Velen begins to read the document.>$B$BInteresting... This does indeed explain much.
